text:
Hey, dear developers in the channel! :slightly_smiling_face:

Have someone worked with "HubSpot Topics" before?
Is that possible to render a list of topics that are linked to post? I found this function: `topic_cluster_by_content_id(content.id)`
But looks like it doesn't provide you URL to topic or "slug" of the topic.

Any idea how it works?

Hi :wave: Does Hubsport support search through blog posts in a blog listing template, combined with multiple tag filtering and pagination? HubSpotsÂ native site search is not what I am looking for. Or is the solution to implement pagination, search and filters with for example jQuery? <https://www.facebook.com/business/success> would be the solution I am looking for in a blog post listing template:)
